label: specifiedMonetarySummation
comment: The monetary summation totals specified for this header trade settlement.
The monetary summation totals specified for this line trade settlement.
The monetary summation totals specified for this payment trade settlement.

rangeIncludes.comment: A collection of monetary amount totals, specified at line level, for a trade settlement.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
